title: New: Twin Haus – Lumberjack Loveshack (Part I & II)
content:
Having released Part I of Lumberjack Loveshack earlier this year, I’ve eagerly been anticipating the second part to the series, and it doesn’t disappoint.

Combining the two sections, Lumberjack Loveshack comes in at just over nine minutes, and is far and away one of the most ambitious ‘indie’ compositions of recent times. Toying with the jangly Foals inspired guitars, and slightly rough yet unique vocals, with a grander production budget, and a full PR blast behind them, Twin Haus could really go somewhere.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
